docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: MILLIONS of American women who are trying to prevent osteoporosis by increasing their calcium intake may be ignoring the most important cause of the disease: the decline of estrogens after menopause.
docs.snippet: LEAD: MILLIONS of American women who are trying to prevent osteoporosis by increasing their calcium intake may be ignoring the most important cause of the disease: the decline of estrogens after menopause.
